songs.title: MTBK
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Beware of them boys, beware of them boys

[Hook: Labh Janjua & (Deep Jandu)]
Neevee akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
(Beware of them boys, beware of them boys)
Neeveen akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
Aiven kari na kise de naal pyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi
(Bach, bach ke rahi
Bach ke rahi
Bach, bach ke rahi)
Ni tu hune-hune hoyi mutiyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi

[Verse 1: Lazarus]
Yo it's that Punjabi Bruce Banner
And you don’t wanna see me go bananas on guerillas
'Cause they panic when they see us, it's insanity
A mystery - our two forces come together
To cause Desi history, formulated symphony
It goes from Detroit to Lahore to Delhi
It’s a global epidemic
You asked for what you get it
Now you call a paramedics
But what you all forgettin', is that Dr. Khan’s the medic
Just holding an anesthetic
Now you get the picture
As I roll up in a rickshaw
Mixture: Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Govinda
Mundeya ton bacho varna na ravoge zinda
Main te ek sher di qaum ton, call me Simba
Usin' my angrezi to conquer gore and kaale
Ridin' in my vict, on my side Kali Denali
Raised by the OG Chachi Mehmood
Still blazin' that Kashmiri hashish off in the mood

[Hook: Labh Janjua & (Deep Jandu)]
Neeveen akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
(Beware, beware, beware, beware of them boys)
Neeveen akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
Aiven kari na kise de naal pyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi
(Bach, bach ke rahi
Bach ke rahi
Bach, bach ke rahi)
Ni tu hune-hune hoyi mutiyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi

[Verse 2: Bohemia]
Jiven ik kash Kashmiri hashish
Yeah head rush, jadon Bohemia beat te
Labh Janjua tera jaan de baad vi
Dekh gali-gali charche ne tere geet de
Kudiyan ne, what? Laa ditti sandal!
Purse chadd ditte seat te
Hun munday (burraaah...) ik paasay Bhangra paan
Vay dujay paasay crib dance karan beat te (yeah!)
Shaxe mere kol mainu chahida na drama
Doc mere kol medical marijuana
Aapan raat saari nachna saver bhaven hojaye
Kal raat phir aidan aapa jashan manana
Bai jinna vi tu banley patola
Jadon akhiyan ladiyan tethon reha ni jaana
Main gali vich Benz vich firan
Jadon Delhi vich hovan Jaguar chalaavan billo!

[Hook: Labh Janjua & (Deep Jandu)]
Neeveen akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
(Beware, beware, beware, beware of them boys)
Neeviyan tu kuch der paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
Aiven kari na kise de naal pyaar (Billo!)
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi
(Bach, bach ke rahi
Bach ke rahi
Bach, bach ke rahi)
Ni tu hune-hune hoyi mutiyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi

[Verse 3: Lazarus; Bohemia & (Deep Jandu)]
My lyrics let ’em match
Poppin' my CD I’m Shahid Afridi
This my trickin' match
(Bach ke rahi)
Jiven cricket match
Vay teri ball kara catch throughout
We callin' motherfuckers out
(Bach ke rahi)
Unleash fury
On a rapper like I’m about to rip his heart out like Amrish Puri
(Bach ke rahi)
Meri majboori
Ve nayi te variyan de lahoo naal laal rave meri churi
(Bach, bach ke rahi)
We come and crash in to your party
Lights off with Kali Denali
A lotta us of do some Delhi qawali
(Bach ke rahi)
Mainay industry hiladi
Jadon di kalay rang di gaddi GMC di track te chalati
(Bach, bach ke rahi)
I see doomsday comin’ so Batman and Superman
Just came together you say, you say, you say (Bach ke rahi)

[Outro + Instrumental Breakdown: Labh Janjua & (Deep Jandu)]
Beware, beware, beware, beware of them boys
Neeveen akh kuch chir paake rakh le
Palle vich mukhda lukake rakh le
Aiven kari na kise de naal pyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi
(Bach, bach ke rahi
Bach ke rahi
Bach, bach ke rahi)
Ni tu hune-hune hoyi mutiyaar
Mundeya ton bach ke rahi
(Bach, bach ke rahi, yeah)

(Beware of them boys, beware of them boys
Beware of them boys, beware of them boys
Yeah!)
